translation.Message_0_Page_0: We don't have any blood bags in this entire bunker, which is an issue. <color=legendary>Battalion Leader Aleksy</color> is going to need a blood transfusion to survive, so the sooner we get those blood bags the better.
translation.Message_1_Page_0: <color=legendary>Battalion Leader Aleksy</color> probably would have survived had we any blood bags on hand. Unfortunately, that is not the case. So, to prevent that from happening ever again, would you be willing to gather some blood bags?
